title.narrative: Kymppi 2.0 - Promoting sustainable development through corporate responsibility

description.narrative: The project aims to promote a sustainable and equitable livelihood for people living in developing countries by embedding the sustainable development to the business of Finnish SMEs operating in these countries. The project supports companies in building i n-depth and concrete corporate responsibility practices by promoting cooperation between companies and Finnish NGOs operating in developing countries.The NGOs not only have in-depth knowledge of promoting sustainable livelihoods but also important contextu al knowledge of operating in developing countries. Companies on the other hand have the opportunity to offer longer-term and more scalable work than in the projects. Therefore promoting cooperation can have significant benefits for companies NGOs and peopl e in the target countries.The project activities create opportunities for collaboration through networking and finding the shared value. The Hop on online event at the beginning of the project will include short introductions on sustainable business in dev eloping countries. Its purpose is to arouse the interest of companies and NGOs in the project and its themes. Afterwork discussions tackling tough topical issues of sustainable business bring together those interested in the theme and inspire them to parti cipate in the project.The country days focus on specific developing countries and bring together NGOs companies and Finnish immigrant entrepreneurs with a background in the country involved. The discussion will focus on the activities and needs of the part icipating companies and NGOs information sharing and building cooperation.The purpose of the start-up incubators and the Solve the SDGs hackathons is to bring together NGOs and students planning a start-up. The aim is to promote information exchange concre tisation of sustainable development goals as a starting point for future start-ups and to create new innovative sustainable development solutions.All activities are designed to increase the awareness of companies of the themes and benefits of sustainable d evelopment in business as well as the benefits of multi-layered business-NGO cooperation.
